document.full_text: chris bosh continued to make atonement for any misgivings in a trying, acclimating season, finishing with a game-high 34 points as the heat took a 2-1 series lead over the bulls.
document.title: playoffs | heat 96, bulls 85: back in miami, heat is halfway to the finals
lines_and_colors: chris bosh continued to make atonement for any misgivings in a trying, acclimating season, finishing with a game-high 34 points as the heat took a 2-1 series lead over the bulls.
